description: Delicious Yorkshire puddings just in time for Christmas.
name: Traditional Yorkshire Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tray from oven and carefully and evenly pour the batter into the muffin tray. Place the tray back in the oven and cook for 15-20 minutes until the puddings have raised up and browned. Watch the puddings towards end of the cooking time, but don't open oven or remove until they're golden otherwise they will collapse. Serve immediately.

Watch the puddings towards end of the cooking time, but don't open oven or remove until they're golden otherwise they will collapse. Serve immediately.
